metadata.description: Unmatched entries from nyt_bestsellers that could not be merged

entries.title: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING
entries.author: Delia Owens
entries.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.

entries.title: THE GUARDIANS
entries.author: John Grisham
entries.description: Cullen Post, a lawyer and Episcopal minister, antagonizes some ruthless killers when he takes on a wrongful conviction case.

entries.title: CRISS CROSS
entries.author: James Patterson
entries.description: The 27th book in the Alex Cross series. Copycat crimes make the detective question whether an innocent man was executed.

entries.title: A MINUTE TO MIDNIGHT
entries.author: David Baldacci
entries.description: When Atlee Pine returns to her hometown to investigate her sister’s kidnapping from 30 years ago, she winds up tracking a potential serial killer.

entries.title: THE INSTITUTE
entries.author: Stephen King
entries.description: Children with special talents are abducted and sequestered in an institution where the sinister staff seeks to extract their gifts through harsh methods.

entries.title: BLUE MOON
entries.author: Lee Child
entries.description: Jack Reacher gets caught up in a turf war between Ukrainian and Albanian gangs.

entries.title: TWISTED TWENTY-SIX
entries.author: Janet Evanovich
entries.description: The 26th book in the Stephanie Plum series. A New Jersey gangster’s associates go after a bounty hunter’s widowed grandmother.

entries.title: THE TESTAMENTS
entries.author: Margaret Atwood
entries.description: In a sequel to “The Handmaid’s Tale,” old secrets bring three women together as the Republic of Gilead’s theocratic regime shows signs of decay.

entries.title: THE OVERSTORY
entries.author: Richard Powers
entries.description: Winner of the 2019 Pulitzer Prize for fiction. Nine people drawn to trees for different reasons fight for the last of the remaining acres of virgin forest.

entries.title: THE SILENT PATIENT
entries.author: Alex Michaelides
entries.description: Theo Faber looks into the mystery of a famous painter who stops speaking after shooting her husband.

entries.title: THE TATTOOIST OF AUSCHWITZ
entries.author: Heather Morris
entries.description: A concentration camp detainee tasked with permanently marking fellow prisoners falls in love with one of them.

entries.title: THE GIVER OF STARS
entries.author: Jojo Moyes
entries.description: In Depression-era Kentucky, five women refuse to be cowed by men or convention as they deliver books.

entries.title: OLIVE, AGAIN
entries.author: Elizabeth Strout
entries.description: In a follow-up to the Pulitzer Prize-winning novel “Olive Kitteridge,” new relationships, including a second marriage, are encountered in a seaside town in Maine.

entries.title: THE RISE OF MAGICKS
entries.author: Nora Roberts
entries.description: The third book in the Chronicles of the One series. Fallon Swift goes up against an old foe.

entries.title: JOURNEY OF THE PHARAOHS
entries.author: Clive Cussler and Graham Brown
entries.description: The 17th book of the NUMA Files series. The NUMA squad teams with British MI5 to stop arms dealers from stealing ancient relics.

entries.title: AMERICAN DIRT
entries.author: Jeanine Cummins
entries.description: A bookseller flees Mexico for the United States with her son while pursued by the head of a drug cartel.

entries.title: LITTLE FIRES EVERYWHERE
entries.author: Celeste Ng
entries.description: An artist with a mysterious past and a disregard for the status quo upends a quiet town outside Cleveland.

entries.title: LONG RANGE
entries.author: C.J. Box
entries.description: The 20th book in the Joe Pickett series. A grizzly bear attack and an attempted assassination of a local judge baffle the Wyoming game warden.

entries.title: A GOOD NEIGHBORHOOD
entries.author: Therese Anne Fowler
entries.description: A property line and a teenage romance strain relations between two North Carolina families.

entries.title: HOUSE OF EARTH AND BLOOD
entries.author: Sarah J. Maas
entries.description: Passion arises between Bryce Quinlan and Hunt Athalar as they seek to avenge the deaths of Bryce’s friends.

entries.title: BLINDSIDE
entries.author: James Patterson and James O. Born
entries.description: The 12th book in the Michael Bennett series. A serial-killing spree might impact national security.

entries.title: THE SUMMER HOUSE
entries.author: James Patterson and Brendan DuBois
entries.description: Jeremiah Cook, a veteran and former N.Y.P.D. cop, investigates a mass murder near a lake in Georgia.

entries.title: TOM CLANCY: FIRING POINT
entries.author: Mike Maden
entries.description: When an old friend is killed during the bombing of a Barcelona cafe, Jack Ryan Jr. searches for those responsible.

entries.title: FAIR WARNING
entries.author: Michael Connelly
entries.description: The third book in the Jack McEvoy series. A reporter tracks a killer who uses genetic data to pick his victims.

entries.title: THE GUEST LIST
entries.author: Lucy Foley
entries.description: A wedding between a TV star and a magazine publisher on an island off the coast of Ireland turns deadly.

entries.title: BIG SUMMER
entries.author: Jennifer Weiner
entries.description: Daphne Berg’s former best friend asks her to be the maid of honor at her wedding in Cape Cod.

entries.title: SHADOWS IN DEATH
entries.author: J.D. Robb
entries.description: The 51st book of the In Death series. A hitman with possible connections to Eve Dallas’s husband is seen near the scene of a crime.

entries.title: ALL THE DEVILS ARE HERE
entries.author: Louise Penny
entries.description: The 16th book in the Chief Inspector Gamache series. When his billionaire godfather is attacked, Gamache uncovers secrets hidden throughout Paris.

entries.title: THE DARKEST EVENING
entries.author: Ann Cleeves
entries.description: The ninth book in the Vera Stanhope series. An abandoned toddler, a dead woman and a blizzard complicate the holidays in the Northumberland countryside.

entries.title: THE HARBINGER II
entries.author: Jonathan Cahn
entries.description: Nouriel, Ana Goren and a figure known as "the prophet" return as revelations are unlocked.

entries.title: SQUEEZE ME
entries.author: Carl Hiaasen
entries.description: A dead dowager, hungry pythons and occupants of the winter White House shake up the Palm Beach charity ball season.

entries.title: THE LYING LIFE OF ADULTS
entries.author: Elena Ferrante
entries.description: In this coming-of-age story, Giovanna seeks her true reflection in two kindred cities.

entries.title: THICK AS THIEVES
entries.author: Sandra Brown
entries.description: Arden Maxwell returns home to uncover the truth about her father’s involvement in a heist that went wrong 20 years ago.

entries.title: READY PLAYER TWO
entries.author: Ernest Cline
entries.description: In a sequel to “Ready Player One,” Wade Watts discovers a technological advancement and goes on a new quest.

entries.title: THE LAW OF INNOCENCE
entries.author: Michael Connelly
entries.description: The sixth book in the Mickey Haller series. Haller defends himself when police find the body of a former client in his car’s trunk.

entries.title: FORTUNE AND GLORY
entries.author: Janet Evanovich
entries.description: The 27th book in the Stephanie Plum series. Stephanie deals with a soldier of fortune from Little Havana.

entries.title: RHYTHM OF WAR
entries.author: Brandon Sanderson
entries.description: The fourth book in the Stormlight Archive series. Technological discoveries and an ensuing arms race change how a war is fought.

entries.title: THE FOUR WINDS
entries.author: Kristin Hannah
entries.description: As dust storms roll during the Great Depression, Elsa must choose between saving the family and farm or heading West.

entries.title: LIFE AFTER DEATH
entries.author: Sister Souljah
entries.description: In a sequel to “The Coldest Winter Ever,” Winter Santiaga emerges after time served and seeks revenge.

entries.title: FAST ICE
entries.author: Clive Cussler and Graham Brown
entries.description: The 18th book in the NUMA Files series. Kurt Austin and Joe Zavala uncover a decades-old conspiracy when they search for a missing former colleague in Antarctica.

entries.author: Elliot Ackerman and Adm
entries.description: The global balance of power shifts after new cyberweaponry lowers the defenses of U.S. planes and ships.

entries.title: DARK SKY
entries.author: C.J. Box
entries.description: The 21st book in the Joe Pickett series. The Wyoming game warden becomes a target when taking a tech baron on an elk hunting trip.

entries.title: THE DUKE AND I
entries.author: Julia Quinn
entries.description: The first book in the Bridgerton series. Daphne Bridgerton’s reputation soars when she colludes with the Duke of Hastings. The basis of the Netflix series “Bridgerton.”

entries.title: TRANSIENT DESIRES
entries.author: Donna Leon
entries.description: The 30th book in the Commissario Guido Brunetti series. The Carabinieri and the Guardia di Costiera are enlisted to help solve a crime involving technologically gifted perpetrators.

entries.title: THE VISCOUNT WHO LOVED ME
entries.author: Julia Quinn
entries.description: The second book in the Bridgerton series. Kate Sheffield gets in the way of Anthony Bridgerton's intent to marry.

entries.title: GOLDEN GIRL
entries.author: Elin Hilderbrand
entries.description: A Nantucket novelist gets one final summer to watch what happens from the great beyond.

entries.title: TOM CLANCY: TARGET ACQUIRED
entries.author: Don Bentley
entries.description: A cushy assignment to help the C.I.A. puts Jack Ryan Jr. in the sights of trained killers.

entries.title: SOOLEY
entries.author: John Grisham
entries.description: Samuel Sooleymon receives a basketball scholarship to North Carolina Central and determines to bring his family over from a civil war-ravaged South Sudan.

entries.title: FREED
entries.author: E.L. James
entries.description: The final chapter of the Fifty Shades as Told by Christian trilogy delves into the wedding between Christian Grey and Anastasia Steele.

entries.title: LEGACY
entries.author: Nora Roberts
entries.description: Threats put in rhymes and sent from shifting locations escalate as the daughter of a successful fitness celebrity’s own yoga business grows.

entries.title: THE SONG OF ACHILLES
entries.author: Madeline Miller
entries.description: A reimagining of Homer’s “Iliad” that is narrated by Achilles' companion Patroclus.

entries.title: FORGOTTEN IN DEATH
entries.author: J.D. Robb
entries.description: The 53rd book of the In Death series. The property where a decades-old crime occurred belongs to the homicide detective Eve Dallas’s husband.

entries.title: BEAUTIFUL WORLD, WHERE ARE YOU
entries.author: Sally Rooney
entries.description: A novelist, a warehouse worker, an editorial assistant and a political adviser deal with changes.

entries.title: IT ENDS WITH US
entries.author: Colleen Hoover
entries.description: A battered wife raised in a violent home attempts to halt the cycle of abuse; the basis of the film.

entries.title: A SLOW FIRE BURNING
entries.author: Paula Hawkins
entries.description: Three women come under scrutiny when a young man is found gruesomely murdered in a London houseboat.

entries.title: THE SEVEN HUSBANDS OF EVELYN HUGO
entries.author: Taylor Jenkins Reid
entries.description: A movie icon recounts stories of her loves and career to a struggling magazine writer.

entries.title: THE NIGHT SHE DISAPPEARED
entries.author: Lisa Jewell
entries.description: A writer discovers a possible clue near an English country estate of what caused a young couple to go missing.

entries.title: THE MADNESS OF CROWDS
entries.author: Louise Penny
entries.description: The 17th book in the Chief Inspector Gamache series. Gamache is tasked with providing security for a statistics professor whose views are repulsive to him.

entries.title: THE HERON'S CRY
entries.author: Ann Cleeves
entries.description: The second book in the Two Rivers series. Detective Matthew Venn finds a staged murder at the home of a group of artists.

entries.title: NINE PERFECT STRANGERS
entries.author: Liane Moriarty
entries.description: A romance writer becomes fascinated by the owner and director of a health resort.

entries.title: CALL US WHAT WE CARRY
entries.author: Amanda Gorman
entries.description: A debut collection of poems on identity and history by the presidential inaugural poet who wrote “The Hill We Climb.”

entries.title: GO TELL THE BEES THAT I AM GONE
entries.author: Diana Gabaldon
entries.description: The ninth book in the Outlander series. As the Revolutionary War moves closer to Fraser’s Ridge, Claire and Jamie reunite with their daughter and her family.

entries.title: WISH YOU WERE HERE
entries.author: Jodi Picoult
entries.description: Diana O’Toole re-evaluates her seemingly perfect life when a pandemic disrupts her vacation in the Galápagos Islands.

entries.title: THE DARK HOURS
entries.author: Michael Connelly
entries.description: A death on New Year’s Eve, an unsolved murder and a hunt for serial rapists bring Bosch and Ballard back together.

entries.title: AUTOPSY
entries.author: Patricia Cornwell
entries.description: The 25th book in the Kay Scarpetta series. Scarpetta investigates crime scenes in Virginia and outer space.

entries.title: RUN, ROSE, RUN
entries.author: Dolly Parton and James Patterson
entries.description: A singer-songwriter goes to Nashville seeking stardom but is followed by her dark past.

entries.title: SHADOWS REEL
entries.author: C.J. Box
entries.description: The 22nd book in the Joe Pickett series. A fishing guide’s murder, stolen falcons and a Nazi official’s photo album heighten the danger.

entries.title: VERITY
entries.author: Colleen Hoover
entries.description: Lowen Ashleigh is hired by the husband of an injured writer to complete her popular series and uncovers a horrifying truth.

entries.title: THE LIGHTNING ROD
entries.author: Brad Meltzer
entries.description: The second book in the Escape Artist series. Zig stumbles upon a hidden group that threatens America's safety and security.

entries.title: THE MAID
entries.author: Nita Prose
entries.description: When a wealthy man is found dead in his room, a maid at the Regency Grand Hotel becomes a lead suspect.

entries.title: SPARRING PARTNERS
entries.author: John Grisham
entries.description: Three novellas: “Homecoming,” “Strawberry Moon” and “Sparring Partners.”

entries.title: UGLY LOVE
entries.author: Colleen Hoover
entries.description: A casual sexual relationship between Tate and Miles becomes more complicated than they expected.

entries.title: TOM CLANCY: ZERO HOUR
entries.author: Don Bentley
entries.description: Jack Ryan Jr. appears to be the only person who can stop a second Korean war.

entries.title: THE OMEGA FACTOR
entries.author: Steve Berry
entries.description: The UNESCO investigator Nick Lee winds up on the trail of a panel from the Ghent Altarpiece, which was stolen in 1934.

entries.title: NOVEMBER 9
entries.author: Colleen Hoover
entries.description: Ben and Fallon meet on the same day each year but a possible untruth might spoil their relationship.

entries.title: NIGHTWORK
entries.author: Nora Roberts
entries.description: Harry Booth, a master thief, breaks things off with Miranda when a dangerous contact might harm her.

entries.title: MEANT TO BE
entries.author: Emily Giffin
entries.description: Joe, the disappointing scion of a family considered American royalty, and Cate, a budding model seeking to escape her surroundings, find each other.

entries.title: DESPERATION IN DEATH
entries.author: J.D. Robb
entries.description: The 55th book of the In Death series. Eve Dallas is reminded of her past as she investigates a possible sex trafficking ring.

entries.title: HELL AND BACK
entries.author: Craig Johnson
entries.description: The 18th book in the Longmire series. Sheriff Longmire finds an adversary in himself.

entries.title: FIRE AND BLOOD
entries.author: George R.R. Martin
entries.description: Set 300 years before the events of “A Game of Thrones,” this is the first volume of the two-part history of the Targaryens in Westeros.

entries.title: LOVE ON THE BRAIN
entries.author: Ali Hazelwood
entries.description: Heartbeats quicken and neurons fire when a pair of antagonistic scientists work together on a project.

entries.title: A WORLD OF CURIOSITIES
entries.author: Louise Penny
entries.description: The 18th book in the Chief Inspector Gamache series. When an attic room that was sealed off 160 years ago is opened, an old enemy returns.

entries.title: DAISY JONES & THE SIX
entries.author: Taylor Jenkins Reid
entries.description: A fictional oral history charting the rise and fall of a ’70s rock ’n’ roll band.

entries.title: NEVER NEVER
entries.author: Colleen Hoover and Tarryn Fisher
entries.description: Questions arise when a pair of lovers try to uncover why they suddenly became strangers.

entries.title: WORTHY OPPONENTS
entries.author: Danielle Steel
entries.description: A divorced mother of twins and chief executive of a luxury department store goes against a wealthy investor looking to take it over.

entries.title: STORM WATCH
entries.author: C.J. Box
entries.description: The 23rd book in the Joe Pickett series. Joe and Nate might be on opposite sides for the first time.

entries.title: CROSS DOWN
entries.author: James Patterson and Brendan DuBois
entries.description: John Sampson seeks justice after Alex Cross gets injured.

entries.title: FOURTH WING
entries.author: Rebecca Yarros
entries.description: Violet Sorrengail is urged by the commanding general, who also is her mother, to become a candidate for the elite dragon riders.

entries.title: NEAR MISS
entries.author: Stuart Woods and Brett Battles
entries.description: The 64th book in the Stone Barrington series. Stone encounters some familiar enemies.

entries.title: CLIVE CUSSLER: FIRE STRIKE
entries.author: Mike Maden
entries.description: The 17th book in the Oregon Files series. Juan Cabrillo’s crew takes on a force of bio-hacked soldiers.

entries.title: ICEBREAKER
entries.author: Hannah Grace
entries.description: Anastasia might need the help of the captain of a college hockey team to get on the Olympic figure skating team.

entries.title: IDENTITY
entries.author: Nora Roberts
entries.description: After her roommate is killed by a con artist, a former Army brat builds a new life at her mother's home in Vermont.

entries.title: VINCE FLYNN: CODE RED
entries.author: Kyle Mills
entries.description: The 22nd book in the Mitch Rapp series. Rapp and his team try to foil a plot by Russia without being discovered.

entries.title: 23 1/2 LIES
entries.author: James Patterson
entries.description: Three thrillers: “23 ½ Lies” (written with Maxine Paetro), “Fallen Ranger” (written with Andrew Bourelle) and “Watch Your Back” (written with Loren D. Estleman).

entries.title: FALL OF RUIN AND WRATH
entries.author: Jennifer L. Armentrout
entries.description: In a world where only nine cities were spared divine destruction, Calista must decide whether to follow her intuition to safety or court calamity by pursuing a love.

entries.title: PAYBACK IN DEATH
entries.author: J.D. Robb
entries.description: The 57th book of the In Death series. Eve Dallas looks into the death of an internal affairs captain.

entries.title: THE VASTER WILDS
entries.author: Lauren Groff
entries.description: A servant girl, who escapes with almost nothing from a colonial settlement, finds the beliefs she learned are tested.

entries.title: IRON FLAME
entries.author: Rebecca Yarros
entries.description: The second book in the Empyrean series. Violet Sorrengail’s next round of training under the new vice commandant might require her to betray the man she loves.

entries.title: THE EXCHANGE
entries.author: John Grisham
entries.description: In a sequel to “The Firm,” Mitch McDeere, who is now a partner at the world’s largest law firm, gets caught up in a sinister plot.

entries.title: THE LITTLE LIAR
entries.author: Mitch Albom
entries.description: The actions of an 11-year-old boy help facilitate the delivery of Jewish residents, including his family, to Auschwitz.

entries.title: THE EDGE
entries.author: David Baldacci
entries.description: The second book in the 6:20 Man series. Travis Devine investigates the murder of the C.I.A. operative Jenny Silkwell in rural Maine.

entries.title: ALL THE LIGHT WE CANNOT SEE
entries.author: Anthony Doerr
entries.description: The lives of a blind French girl and a gadget-obsessed German boy before and during World War II.

entries.title: ALEX CROSS MUST DIE
entries.author: James Patterson
entries.description: The 32nd book in the Alex Cross series. When a jet is gunned down, Cross goes back into action.

entries.title: A TOUCH OF CHAOS
entries.author: Scarlett St
entries.description: The seventh book in the Hades X Persephone series. The Goddess of Spring must come to terms with her new identity as the Queen of the Underworld.

entries.title: STILL SEE YOU EVERYWHERE
entries.author: Lisa Gardner
entries.description: The third book in the Frankie Elkin series. Frankie must find the sister, who was kidnapped over a decade ago, of a serial killer on death row.

entries.title: THE HUNTER
entries.author: Tana French
entries.description: The life that a Chicago P.D. retiree has built in Ireland with a local woman and her daughter comes under threat.

entries.title: SWAN SONG
entries.author: Elin Hilderbrand
entries.description: Nantucket residents are alarmed when a home, recently sold at an exorbitant price, goes up in flames and someone goes missing.

entries.title: ERUPTION
entries.author: Michael Crichton and James Patterson
entries.description: The Big Island of Hawaii comes under threat by a volcano at the same time a secret held by the military comes to light.

entries.title: CAMINO GHOSTS
entries.author: John Grisham
entries.description: The third book in the Camino series. The last living inhabitant of a deserted island gets in the way of a resort developer.

entries.title: A COURT OF THORNS AND ROSES
entries.author: Sarah J. Maas
entries.description: After killing a wolf in the woods, Feyre is taken from her home and placed inside the world of the Fae.

entries.title: YOU LIKE IT DARKER
entries.author: Stephen King
entries.description: A dozen short stories that explore darkness in literal and metaphorical forms.

entries.title: A COURT OF MIST AND FURY
entries.author: Sarah J. Maas
entries.description: The second book in the Court of Thorns and Roses series. Feyre gains the powers of the High Fae and a greater evil emerges.

entries.title: THIS SUMMER WILL BE DIFFERENT
entries.author: Carley Fortune
entries.description: Lucy returns to Prince Edward Island, where she finds it difficult to stay away from her best friend’s younger brother.

entries.title: LEATHER AND LARK
entries.author: Brynne Weaver
entries.description: The second book in the Ruinous Love series. An indie musician offers a contract killer a way to his freedom, but only if he'll marry her.

entries.title: SOMEWHERE BEYOND THE SEA
entries.author: TJ Klune
entries.description: The second book in the Cerulean Chronicles series. The headmaster of a strange orphanage seeks to protect the magical children who reside there.

entries.title: HERE ONE MOMENT
entries.author: Liane Moriarty
entries.description: Passengers on a short and seemingly unremarkable flight learn how and when they are going to die.

entries.title: TELL ME EVERYTHING
entries.author: Elizabeth Strout
entries.description: As a murder casts a pall on a town in Maine, Lucy Barton, Olive Kitteridge and Bob Burgess share stories and seek meaning.

entries.title: THE PERFECT COUPLE
entries.author: Elin Hilderbrand
entries.description: A body is found in Nantucket Harbor hours before a picture-perfect wedding.

entries.title: VINCE FLYNN: CAPTURE OR KILL
entries.author: Don Bentley
entries.description: The 23rd book in the Mitch Rapp series. In 2011, operations take place to prevent a looming war in the Middle East.

entries.title: THE GAMES GODS PLAY
entries.author: Abigail Owen
entries.description: Gods enlist mortals to fight in their stead to determine who will sit on the throne in Olympus.

entries.title: THE LIFE IMPOSSIBLE
entries.author: Matt Haig
entries.description: A retired math teacher who inherits a run-down house on a Mediterranean island from a friend goes in search of answers.

entries.title: WIND AND TRUTH
entries.author: Brandon Sanderson
entries.description: The fifth book in the Stormlight Archive series. The fate of the Cosmere is imperiled as the fighting and chaos reach an apex.

entries.title: WICKED
entries.author: Gregory Maguire
entries.description: A misunderstood girl named Elphaba is declared a witch; the basis of the musical and the film.

entries.title: THE HOUSE OF CROSS
entries.author: James Patterson
entries.description: The 33rd book in the Alex Cross series. Three candidates to the Supreme Court are violently attacked.

entries.title: THE GOD OF THE WOODS
entries.author: Liz Moore
entries.description: When a 13-year-old girl disappears from an Adirondack summer camp in 1975, secrets kept by the Van Laar family emerge.

entries.title: THE WEDDING PEOPLE
entries.author: Alison Espach
entries.description: A woman who is down on her luck forms an unexpected bond with the bride at a wedding in Rhode Island.

entries.title: QUICKSILVER
entries.author: Callie Hart
entries.description: Saeris is transported to a dangerous land of ice and snow, where she must contend with a Fae warrior who has suspect agendas.

entries.title: TO DIE FOR
entries.author: David Baldacci
entries.description: The third book in the 6:20 Man series. Devine digs into the deaths of an orphan’s parents and uncovers a large conspiracy.

entries.title: COUNTING MIRACLES
entries.author: Nicholas Sparks
entries.description: A man in search of the father he never knew encounters a single mom and rumors circulate of the nearby appearance of a white deer.

entries.title: ONYX STORM
entries.author: Rebecca Yarros
entries.description: The third book in the Empyrean series. As enemies gain traction, Violet Sorrengail goes beyond the Aretian wards in search of allies.

entries.title: STORY OF MY LIFE
entries.author: Lucy Score
entries.description: A romance writer suffering from writer’s block moves away from Manhattan and finds inspiration in Story Lake, Pa.

entries.title: BROKEN COUNTRY
entries.author: Clare Leslie Hall
entries.description: Beth must confront her past when the man she once loved as a teenager returns to the village with his son.

entries.title: WARD D
entries.author: Freida McFadden
entries.description: Patients and staff at a hospital’s mental health unit begin to disappear.

entries.title: THE NIGHTINGALE
entries.author: Kristin Hannah
entries.description: Two sisters in World War II France: one struggling to survive in the countryside, the other joining the Resistance.

entries.title: THE CRASH
entries.author: Freida McFadden
entries.description: A pregnant woman, who suffers an injury during a blizzard, is taken in by a couple who might put her life in further jeopardy.

entries.title: DEEP END
entries.author: Ali Hazelwood
entries.description: As the pressure leading up to the Olympics builds so do the feelings Lukas and Scarlett have for each other.

entries.title: LIGHTS OUT
entries.author: Navessa Allen
entries.description: As Aly and Josh live out their dark fantasies, someone with sinister intentions impinges on them.

entries.title: WILD SIDE
entries.author: Elsie Silver
entries.description: The third book in the Rose Hill series. Tension rises between Tabitha and Rhys.

entries.title: CAUGHT UP
entries.author: Navessa Allen
entries.description: The second book of the Into Darkness series. Nico “Junior” Trocci and Lauren Marchetti become ensnared in a game of seduction.

entries.title: BURY OUR BONES IN THE MIDNIGHT SOIL
entries.author: V.E. Schwab
entries.description: Stories set in Santo Domingo de la Calzada in 1532, London in 1827 and Boston in 2019 explore hunger, love and rage.

entries.title: ATMOSPHERE
entries.author: Taylor Jenkins Reid
entries.description: In the summer of 1980, Joan Goodwin begins training with a group of candidates for NASA’s space shuttle program.

entries.title: THE FIRST GENTLEMAN
entries.author: Bill Clinton and James Patterson
entries.description: When President Wright’s husband goes on trial for murder, a pair of journalists search for answers.

entries.title: ONE GOLDEN SUMMER
entries.author: Carley Fortune
entries.description: A photographer returns to a place where she spent a summer as a teenager and runs into the guy she had a crush on back then.

entries.title: NEVER FLINCH
entries.author: Stephen King
entries.description: Holly Gibney does double duty by helping head off acts of retribution and protecting a women’s rights activist.

entries.title: THE RIVER IS WAITING
entries.author: Wally Lamb
entries.description: A man struggling in several areas of his life is sentenced to prison, where he encounters acts of kindness and brutality.

entries.title: THE TENANT
entries.author: Freida McFadden
entries.description: Things take an unsettling turn when a marketing executive loses his job and a woman rents a room in his brownstone.

entries.title: WITH A VENGEANCE
entries.author: Riley Sager
entries.description: The murder of a passenger on a luxury train disrupts Anna Matheson’s plan to get retribution for her family’s downfall.

entries.title: PROBLEMATIC SUMMER ROMANCE
entries.author: Ali Hazelwood
entries.description: Things get complicated between an older biotech guy and a struggling graduate student who go to a destination wedding.

entries.title: GREAT BIG BEAUTIFUL LIFE
entries.author: Emily Henry
entries.description: A writer looking for her big break competes against a Pulitzer winner to tell the story of an octogenarian with a storied past.

entries.title: NIGHTSHADE
entries.author: Michael Connelly
entries.description: The Los Angeles County sheriff's detective Stilwell gets reassigned to Catalina Island, where he investigates a poaching case and a Jane Doe found in the harbor.

entries.title: KING OF ASHES
entries.author: S.A. Cosby
entries.description: Roman Carruthers uses his finance skills to deal with criminals and try to hold his family together.

entries.title: THE SECRET OF SECRETS
entries.author: Dan Brown
entries.description: As he searches for the missing noetic scientist he has been seeing, Robert Langdon discovers something regarding a secret project.

entries.title: WILD CARD
entries.author: Elsie Silver
entries.description: The fourth book in the Rose Hill series. Gwen gets close to her ex-boyfriend’s dad, who is trying to repair his relationship with his son.

entries.title: CLOWN TOWN
entries.author: Mick Herron
entries.description: The ninth book in the Slough House series. Lessons from old spies may come to bear as the ugly side of state security is threatened with exposure.

entries.title: KATABASIS
entries.author: R.F. Kuang
entries.description: A pair of rival graduate students descend into the underworld to save their late professor and secure his recommendation.

entries.title: LOVER FORBIDDEN
entries.author: J.R. Ward
entries.description: The 23rd book in the Black Dagger Brotherhood series. Devlin’s secret may sour Lyric’s new zest for life.

entries.title: FRAMED IN DEATH
entries.author: J.D. Robb
entries.description: The 61st book of the In Death series. Eve Dallas investigates the murder of a woman found in the doorway of two gallery owners' home.

entries.title: PITCHER PERFECT
entries.author: Tessa Bailey
entries.description: The fourth book in the Big Shots series. A hockey player poses as the boyfriend of a softball pitcher.

entries.title: CLIVE CUSSLER: THE IRON STORM
entries.author: Jack Du Brul
entries.description: The 15th book in the Isaac Bell series. During the Great War, evil forces want to take the fight to the streets of the United States.

entries.title: BUCKEYE
entries.author: Patrick Ryan
entries.description: Consequences created by a secret forged between members of two families in a small Ohio town affect a new generation.

entries.title: THE HALLMARKED MAN
entries.author: Robert Galbraith
entries.description: The eighth book in the Cormoran Strike series. A dismembered corpse found in a silver shop sets off an investigation.

entries.title: MY FRIENDS
entries.author: Fredrik Backman
entries.description: A young woman looks into the story behind a painting that was made 25 years ago and a small group of teens depicted in it; translated by Neil Smith.

entries.title: PEOPLE WATCHING
entries.author: Hannah Bonam-Young
entries.description: A relationship between Prudence and Milo in a small Ontario town may shift to something beyond their expectations.
